guide_subtitle: Master the art of legal argumentation
game_overview_description: DISPUTED! is a best-of-3 competitive debate game where players receive the same legal case but argue from different perspectives. Players alternate roles across rounds, with AI judging each round. If tied after 2 rounds, the best performer chooses their role for the decisive 3rd round!
create_game_step_1: Click 'CREATE GAME' to start a new game
create_game_step_2: Share the room code with your friend
create_game_step_3: Wait for your friend to join
create_game_step_4: Ready up and start the debate!
join_game_step_1: Click 'JOIN GAME' to enter a room
join_game_step_2: Enter the room code provided by your friend
case_assignment_description: Both players receive the same legal case to study
round_1_description: Roles assigned randomly - one defends, one attacks
round_2_description: Roles switch - the defender becomes the attacker
tiebreaker_round_description: If tied after 2 rounds, best performer chooses their role for the final round
victory_description: First to win 2 rounds wins the game
winning_tips_step1: Aim to win first 2 rounds quickly
winning_tips_step2: Master both sides of the case
winning_tips_step4: Choose your stronger role if tied
winning_tips_step5: Pay attention to the other player's arguments
username_is_set: Username is set from your profile
debate_chamber_code: Share this code with your friend
prosecutor_role: You'll present the case and challenge your opponent
defender_role: You'll counter arguments and protect your position
prosecutor_mission: ðŸŽ¯ Your mission: Build a compelling argument and prove your case
defender_mission: ðŸŽ¯ Your mission: Refute claims and establish reasonable doubt
scales_spoken: Justice has spoken! Preparing the courtroom...
generating_random_case: AI is generating a random case...
loading_description: Please wait while we connect to the game room.
each_round_requires: Each round requires 3 exchanges (6 total arguments) before AI analysis.
hurry: HURRY! The opponent can interrupt you!
case_review_description: You can review the case details anytime during the battle
battle_concluded: The battle has concluded! Review the final analysis above.
sign_in_continue: Sign in to continue your legal battles
error_occurred_signin: An error occurred during sign in
failed_signin_google: Failed to sign in with Google
create_account_competing: Create your account to start competing
username_min_3_chars: Username must be at least 3 characters
username_alphanumeric: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
valid_email_required: Please enter a valid email address
password_min_8_chars: Password must be at least 8 characters
reset_password_description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
check_email_reset_link: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
reset_link_invalid_expired: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
password_reset_success_message: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now sign in with your new password.
password_min_6_chars: Password must be at least 6 characters long
error_occurred_try_again: An error occurred. Please try again.
forgot_password_subtitle: No worries! Enter your email and we'll send you reset instructions.
check_email_reset_link_with_email: We've sent a password reset link to {{email}}
check_spam_folder: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try again.
ssl_certificate_message: Your browser needs to trust our self-signed certificate to connect securely.
ssl_certificate_action: Click the button to proceed safely!
